title: There should be an XP compensation for time wasted in remakes.
body:
I can understand that an AFK player can ruin a game, but I hate the remake vote. Most people who AFK do it during the mid - late game, for various reasons, and very rarely do they AFK during the first few minutes of a game. Quite frankly, its a waste of time.

Often I find remakes taking up around 10-12 minutes of time , and it's very annoying that I'm not compensated for this. Trying to get level 30 on this account is already a trek as it is, and the frequent remakes every 3 or so games are quite annoying.

Of course, I'm not asking Riot compensate us with copious amounts of XP every remake, but it would be nice to receive 20 or 30 XP so I know that all that time wasted wasn't for nothing.
